title: Help missing DLL file caused low priorty Q
body: How can I get out of low priority Q?  I was recently put in a 5 minute Q time because I had two leaves in games, one of them was my own fault my wife got in a car accident, but the other was a game crash.  I recently tried to play logged into the game, and it let me go through champ select.  I went to start and I got a popup saying I was missing a DLL file.  I had never had this happen before, but why should I be punished for this?  The client let me log in and everything, it just failed to launch the game.  How is this my fault and why shoudl I be punished for it?

replies.body:
It looks like there may be a missing or corrupt file that is causing you to crash.  When you have some time, please go over our [Game Crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide that offers some troubleshoot steps.  For your specific issue, the Repair portion of the guide my be the most beneficial.  I don't recommend looking for files through unknown sources or sites, as they might prove to be malicious or a security risk. 

A lower priority queue won't happen after only one game, but consistent leaves.  All leaves cause a negative experience for players, and will treat them the same regardless of intent.  For visibility on your specific account issue, you can reach out to our Player Behavior team for context by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

I hope that helps, and I wish both you and your wife all the best.

> [{quoted}](name=ShyR0nnie,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jMdUrhAO,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-15T16:33:07.369+0000)

I can help with that just download the .dll its telling you that is missing just go type on bing/google Msvcr120.dll  and look for a website call dll-files and get the .dll you need
